uniport.data_loader.load_dataÔÉÅ

uniport.data_loader.load_data(adatas, mode='h', num_cell=None, max_gene=None, adata_cm=None, use_specific=False, domain_name='domain_id', batch_size=256, drop_last=True, shuffle=True, num_workers=4)[source]ÔÉÅ

Load data for training.

Parameters

  • adatas ‚Äì A list of AnnData matrice.

  • mode ‚Äì training mode. Choose between [‚Äòh‚Äô, ‚Äòd‚Äô, ‚Äòv‚Äô].

  • num_cell ‚Äì numbers of cells of each adata in adatas.

  • max_gene ‚Äì maximum number of genes of each adata in adatas.

  • adata_cm ‚Äì adata with common genes of adatas.

  • use_specific ‚Äì use dataset-specific genes.

  • domain_name ‚Äì domain name of each adata in adatas.

  • batch_size ‚Äì size of each mini batch for training.

  • drop_last ‚Äì drop the last samples that not up to one batch.

  • shuffle ‚Äì shuffle the data

  • num_workers ‚Äì number parallel load processes according to cpu cores.

Returns

  • trainloader ‚Äì data loader for training

  • testloader ‚Äì data loader for testing
